articles.title: That Time Putin Visited A St. Petersburg Strip Club As Russia Waged War In Chechnya - Radio Free Europe / Radio Liberty
articles.description: Russian celebrities are scrambling to apologize for attending an “Almost Naked” party as the Kremlin’s war on Ukraine grinds on. A quarter-century ago, Vladimir Putin visited a St. Petersburg strip club as Russian forces fought a bloody campaign in Chechnya.
